analyzed: bas gsang ste brgyad mi'i rus rigs cho 'brang lha'i bzhi las yul bstan pa go ba'o/_/dang dbye/_/

analyzed: mnan pas dbang po drug mig long ba rna ba 'on pa sna zhom pa ngag lkug pa lus skem pa sems myos pa'o/_/

analyzed: ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes/_/gces par byas na 'grub par nges/_/de yi
translated: Even if the master gives the disciple the supreme instructions, if the disciple does not have doubts and cherishes the master‚Äôs supreme instructions, he will certainly accomplish them.

analyzed: bla ma mnyes par lus ngag yid gsum gyi bya ba bya bar gces/_/bsnyen bskur byas pas
translated: It is important to please the master with the actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: tshhogs rdzogs pa dang yid ches pas nus mthu che/_/gsang ste spyod pas bar gang la yang chad med//

translated: By making respect and service, the accumulations are completed and confidence is gained, so the power of ability is great.üîΩBy practicing in secret, there is no interruption in anything.

original: yon tan ci'i phyir mthu che zhe na yid ches pa dang yon chen phul bar byas pas ni/_/rang don grub
analyzed: yon tan ci'i phyir mthu che zhe na yid ches pa dang yon chen phul bar byas pas ni/_/rang don grub
translated: Because of the trust and the great offerings,üîΩthe two jewels of the mind that accomplishes one‚Äôs own purposeüîΩare accomplished.

original: pa'i sems rin chen grub grub rnam gnyis 'gyur/_/rin chen chos gzugs rang gzhan gnyis
analyzed: pa'i sems rin chen grub grub rnam gnyis 'gyur/_/rin chen chos gzugs rang gzhan gnyis
translated: The jewel of the Dharma and the jewel of the form bodyüîΩare produced by the accomplishment of the karma of both oneself and others.

original: kyi las grub pas 'byung /_/dkon par gyur na bla ma dang gdams pa gzhan las
analyzed: kyi las grub pas 'byung /_/dkon par gyur na bla ma dang gdams pa gzhan las
translated: If it is rare, it is praised as being superior to other gurus and instructions.

original: 'phags pa bsngags pa brjod/_/dam par byas te bsngags na yon tan mchog thun mong 'byung
analyzed: 'phags pa bsngags pa brjod/_/dam par byas te bsngags na yon tan mchog thun mong 'byung
translated: If it is praised as being holy, the supreme and common qualities will arise.

original: gyur te/_/sngags pa dag bla ma la ma gus shing gdams ngag la yid ches med pas mi 'grub ni ma byas
analyzed: gyur te/_/sngags pa dag bla ma la ma gus shing gdams ngag la yid ches med pas mi 'grub ni ma byas
translated: If the mantra practitioner does not disrespect the guru and has trust in the instructions, it is not the case that they will not be accomplished.

original: na/_/ji ltar dper na yid bzhin nor bu yang /_/gang gis bsngags pa byi dor dang mchod sogs ma byas pa/_/de la 'dod pa'i don mi ster ba ltar ro ro/_/dad pa gtsho bor
analyzed: na/_/ji ltar dper na yid bzhin nor bu yang /_/gang gis bsngags pa byi dor dang mchod sogs ma byas pa/_/de la 'dod pa'i don mi ster ba ltar ro ro/_/dad pa gtsho bor
translated: Just as, for example, a wish-fulfilling jewel does not grant the desired purpose to someone who does not make offerings, praise, and so on,üîΩfaith is the root of all qualities.

original: bstan pa bdag gzhan gyi bde ba 'byung bas sangs rgyas myang 'das la 'god pas dad pa chos/_/yod pa
analyzed: bstan pa bdag gzhan gyi bde ba 'byung bas sangs rgyas myang 'das la 'god pas dad pa chos/_/yod pa
translated: Faith is the mother, because it gives rise to the happiness of oneself and others and establishes them in the nirvana of the buddhas.

original: lam las phyir mi ldog pas dad pa dge 'dun bu skyong ba lta bu dad pa ma/_/yon tan thams cad skyedüîΩpas dad pa bla ma bu skyong ba ltar dad pa pha/_/chos gsum dang ldan pa thar pa'i phar phyin par byed pa
analyzed: lam las phyir mi ldog pas dad pa dge 'dun bu skyong ba lta bu dad pa ma/_/yon tan thams cad skyed pas dad pa bla ma bu skyong ba ltar dad pa pha/_/chos gsum dang ldan pa thar pa'i phar phyin par byed pa
translated: Faith is the father, because it is the source of all good qualities and is like a father who cares for his children.

original: dad pa lam chen 'khor ba las bsgrol bas dad pa gru/_/dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas dad pa
analyzed: dad pa lam chen 'khor ba las bsgrol bas dad pa gru/_/dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas dad pa
translated: Faith is the boat that delivers one from samsara, because it is the great path to liberation.üîΩFaith is the wish-fulfilling gem, because it is the source of all that is necessary and desirable.

original: yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/yod pa dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid kyi rtags kyang /_/
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/yod pa dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid kyi rtags kyang /_/
translated: Faith is the sign of the accomplishment of the secret mantra.üîΩFaith is the wealth of previous merit, because it is the seven noble riches.

analyzed: dad pa sngon gyi bsod nams nor 'phags pa'i nor bdun yin te/_/de'i phyir na bsngags
translated: Therefore, it is praised.

original: yon tan thams cad kyi bzhir gyur pas pa yis/_/rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_/
